synopsis.text: In a realm where humans and creatures coexist, a young healer named Yuu, despite his trepidation towards monsters, possesses a unique ability to pacify them. His life takes a dramatic turn when his father presents him with a mystical bottle, housing a blue-haired girl named Merc. With no recollection of her past, Merc transforms from a liquid state within the bottle to a tangible form. United by fate, Yuu and Merc traverse through enchanting lands, their journey centered on uncovering Merc's forgotten memories and true identity, all while transforming menacing monsters into endearing companions.
